name: Apartment No.9
description:
Help Leah find happiness or lead her to ruin in this dark slice-of-life story about a teacher whose life is turned upside down when the homeless guy she often stares at out of her window shows up at her door, claiming to have found her purse.

Apartment No.9 is a game I made for Otome Jam 2021. It is based on a script from the anthology series 'Inside No.9'.

Features
  • Original sprites, CGs, & soundtrack
  • Fully voice acted
  • New game+ with extended & new endings
  • 13 different endings depending on your choices
  • Casual choices & choices with consequences
  • 2 love interests
  • CG gallery & other unlockables
Warnings/Triggers
  • Mild suggestive/NSFW scenes
  • Physical violence
  • Depictions of blood
  • Self-harm
The Characters Bugs & Stuff

Feel free to head here if you find a bug.

Need help getting the game to open on Mac? Check out this post I made with a few possible fixes!

Other Notes

The soundtrack was made while wearing headphones, as I don't have any speakers x3 So if you're playing without headphones, you may need to adjust the sound somewhat to get the best experience. I do recommend playing with headphones though.

Otome Jam 2021 logo seen in the trailer video is by Foleso.

I might make an alternate sorta genderbended version of this sometime soon where the protagonist is male and features female versions of Aku and Doyle.
